When unchecking "always show tabstrip" in Options > Tabs, Firefox 4.0 hides the tabstrip even if there are TWO tabs remaining after closing a third tabstrip.
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Uncheck "always show tabstrip" in Options > Tabs 2. Open three tabs 3. Close third tab Actual Results: The tabstrip becomes invisible.
Expected Results: The tabstrip should still be displayed. Only if there is one single tab opened, the tabstrip should hide.

Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110405 Firefox/4.2a1pre
Works fine for me. Able to see the tab strip even after closing the 3rd tab. Please try if you can reproduce it or if it works fine
1.in safe mode. https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode
2.or by creating a new profile https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Managing+profiles#Creating_a_profile.

Strange... Today I can't reproduce the problem myself anymore...
I cannot explain why it happened yesterday repeatedly... Perhaps I can reproduce it later again... Perhaps some prerequisites are necessary for this to happen.
Marking this as WorksForMe. If you still experience the issue feel free to reopen the bug.
